404.title: This page’s gone fishing.
404.text: If you feel that it’s not right, please send us a message at

slogan.slogan_1: We Provide Oral Health Services to

intro.introducion: At our dental clinic, we provide comprehensive and personalized care for all your dental needs. From routine cleanings to advanced surgeries, we ensure your oral health is in the best hands.
intro.special_surgeries_description: Our clinic offers specialized surgical procedures to address complex dental issues, all performed by highly skilled professionals using state-of-the-art technology.
intro.top_quality_treatment_description: From preventive care to restorative treatments, we offer top-quality services that ensure your teeth remain healthy and your smile bright.
intro.ending: Experience the best in dental care, where reliability and quality are at the heart of everything we do.

first_appointment.question: Do I need to arrive early for my first appointment?
first_appointment.answer: Yes, at least 15 minutes early to fill out essential paperwork and give the staff time to get you all set up.

dental_trouble_signs.question: What are early signs of dental trouble?
dental_trouble_signs.answer: The possible early signs of dental trouble are: Toothache; Sensitive Teeth; Bleeding or Sore Gums; Bad Breath; Cavities; Jaw Pain; Mouth Sores; Dry Mouth; Broken, Cracked, Chipped, Lost.

visit_frequency.question: How often should I visit the dentist?
visit_frequency.answer: It's generally recommended to visit your dentist for a check-up and cleaning every six months. However, your dentist may suggest more frequent visits based on your individual oral health needs.

step.title: Set your appointment now through these three (3) easy steps.

first.title: Sign up.
first.description2: page and create an account. Fill in your details and verify your email address.

second.title: Set an appointment.
second.description: Next, choose the service you need, date, and time at
second.description2: page. You can also select your preferred doctor.

final.title: Done.
final.description: View your scheduled appointments in the
final.description2: page. You can also cancel or reschedule your appointments.

cards.contentText: The unique stripes of zebras make them one of the animals most familiar to people.
cards.contentTextLong: The unique stripes of zebras make them one of the animals most familiar to people. They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, woodlands, thorny scrublands, mountains, and coastal hills. Various anthropogenic factors have had a severe impact on zebra populations, in particular hunting for skins and habitat destruction. Grévy's zebra and the mountain zebra are endangered. While plains zebras are much more plentiful, one subspecies, the quagga.
